Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.analysis.tokenattributes

Class CharsAttWin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.analysis.tokenattributes.CharsAttWin
  • public class CharsAttWin
extends Object
    Used in a Lucene Analyzer, a LIFO stack of search to keep trace of tokens for compounds.
